thread.title: First Lady Melania Trump turns to British label Alexander McQueen for her latest Republican Red outfit
thread.title_full: First Lady Melania Trump turns to British label Alexander McQueen for her latest Republican Red outfit

title: First Lady Melania Trump turns to British label Alexander McQueen for her latest Republican Red outfit
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 34 View All Skip Ad 
Former First Lady Nancy Reagan was first to coin the term Republican Red, when she adopted the colour as her signature during her White House years. 
Now it seems Melania Trump is following suit, employing the patriotic colour on significant occasions - such as yesterday at a Florida rally where she promised to support initiatives that would help women and children around the world. 
In some ways though, the fitted Alexander McQueen dress was characteristic of the serious-but-sexy take on political dressing Melania Trump has developed over the past year. 
Click through the gallery to see her style evolution - and what we can expect from the he first foreign born First Lady to enter the White House since 1825.... AP Photo/Chris O'Meara
